Additional Description

OUR ORIGINAL MOZZARELLA CHEESE STICK. CREAMY STRING CHEESE IN ITALIAN BREADING & FLASH FROZEN. ALTHOUGH LONGER, THIS STICK IS SKINNIER GIVING MORE PLATE COVERAGE THAN SIZE. EACH 1Z. STICK IS 3.25" REAL MOZZARELLA WHICH IS CREAMY, STRETCHY, & HAS A FIRM BITE. 192/CS

Ingredients

MOZZARELLA CHEESE (PASTEURIZED PART SKIM MILK, CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES), ENRICHED BLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT FLOUR, NIACIN, FERROUS SULFATE, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), WATER. CONTAINS LESS THAN 2% OF: ROMANO AND PARMESAN CHEESES (PASTEURIZED COW'S MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES), DRIED GARLIC, DRIED ONION, DRIED PARSLEY, SPICES, YELLOW CORN FLOUR, SUGAR, NATURAL FLAVOR, DRIED YEAST, SOYBEAN OIL, DEXTROSE, MODIFIED CORN STARCH, LEAVENING (SODIUM ACID PYROPHOSPHATE, SODIUM BICARBONATE), SALT.

Product Information

Class: 20 - APPETIZERS, ENTREES, & POTATOES REF & FZN Category: 335 - APPETIZERS AND COATED VEGETABLES Group: 1372 - APPETIZERS, CHEESE, BREADED & BATTERED

Manufacturer Information

MOLLY'S KITCHEN
